name: Roundabout Way
description:
You’re stuck at the centre of the world’s largest roundabout! You don’t know how you got there. To be honest, you’re not really convinced of the practicality of such a large roundabout. Regardless, you’re in the middle and you need to get out!

Play with a gamepad or keyboard!

Controls

Keyboard:

  • Change lanes with A/D or Left/Right Arrow
  • Accelerate with W or the Up Arrow
  • Brake with S or the Down Arrow

Gamepad:

  • Change lanes with the Left Stick or Left/Right on the D-Pad
  • Accelerate with the Right Trigger
  • Brake with the Left Trigger
